title: League  of Legends has been blocked from accessing Graphics Hardware
body: How do i fix this. I've tried uninstalling, reinstalling, and updating graphics drivers and nothing. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: Hmmmm it kind of sounds like your pc is having a hard time accessing your actual graphics card and not reverting to the onboard graphics. You might be able to get it working correctly again by reinstalling that graphics driver as the administrator. Give that a go and let me know how it works!
